targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  post_video_view_time
FROM facebookinsightsownposts
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  post_video_view_time
FROM facebookinsightsownposts
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  post_video_view_time
FROM facebookinsightsownposts
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT "Zoom-Anpassung" as text ,UNIX_SECONDS(DATE_SUB(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(),INTERVAL 1 DAY)) as time_to,
CASE
WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Gestern" THEN UNIX_SECONDS(TIMESTAMP(DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(),INTERVAL 2 DAY)))
WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Letzte 7 Tage" THEN UNIX_SECONDS(TIMESTAMP(DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(),INTERVAL 8 DAY)))
WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Letzte 30 Tage" THEN UNIX_SECONDS(TIMESTAMP(DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(),INTERVAL 31 DAY))) END AS time_from

SELECT
  $Aktion_select as current_sum,
  TIMESTAMP_SUB(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(time, DAY), INTERVAL 1 HOUR) as currenttime
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebookInsights`
WHERE profileId = $profileID
AND $Zeitraum 
  GROUP BY currenttime

SELECT
  $Aktion_select as past_sum,
  TIMESTAMP_SUB(DATE_ADD(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(time, DAY), INTERVAL $time_shift DAY), INTERVAL 1 HOUR) as past_time
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebookInsights`
WHERE profileId = $profileID
AND $Vergleichszeitraum
GROUP BY time

SELECT
  $Aktion_select as current_sum,
  TIMESTAMP_SUB(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(time, DAY), INTERVAL 1 HOUR) as currenttime
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebookInsights`
WHERE profileId = $profileID
AND $Zeitraum 
  GROUP BY currenttime

  $Aktion_select as past_sum,
  TIMESTAMP_SUB(DATE_ADD(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(time, DAY), INTERVAL $time_shift DAY), INTERVAL 1 HOUR) as past_time
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebookInsights`
WHERE profileId = $profileID
AND $Vergleichszeitraum
GROUP BY time

panels.description: Stichtag: heute

targets.rawSql:
SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_big - CHAR_LENGTH(CAST(Follower as STRING))), REPLACE(CAST(FORMAT("%'.0f", CAST(ROUND(Follower) as NUMERIC)) AS STRING), ",", "."))FROM(
SELECT 
followers AS Follower
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebook`
  WHERE profileId = $profileID 
  AND time = (SELECT MAX(time) FROM  `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebook` WHERE profileId = $profileID)

)

SELECT a.followers - b.followers as followersChange,
FROM (
  SELECT followers
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebook`
  WHERE $profileID = profileId
  AND EXTRACT(DATE from time)  = ( CASE 
  --WHEN CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${Zeitraum:text}", "24h") THEN CURRENT_DATE()
  --WHEN CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${Zeitraum:text}", "Gestern") THEN  DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL  1 DAY)
  WHEN CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${Zeitraum:text}", "7") THEN  DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL  1 DAY)
  WHEN CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${Zeitraum:text}", "30") THEN  DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL  1 DAY)
  WHEN CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${Zeitraum:text}", "Letztes Wochenende") THEN DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL  1 DAY)
  ELSE DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL  1 DAY)
  END)

) as a,
 (
  SELECT followers
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebook`
  WHERE $profileID = profileId
  AND EXTRACT(DATE from time)  = ( CASE 
  --WHEN CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${Zeitraum:text}", "24h") THEN CURRENT_DATE()
  --WHEN CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${Zeitraum:text}", "Gestern") THEN  DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL  1 DAY)
  WHEN CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${Zeitraum:text}", "7") THEN  DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL  8 DAY)
  WHEN CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${Zeitraum:text}", "30") THEN  DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL  31 DAY)
  -- Taking the followers value from the last weekened
  WHEN CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${Zeitraum:text}", "Letztes Wochenende") THEN DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 
    IF(DATE_TRUNC(CURRENT_DATE(), WEEK(SATURDAY)) = CURRENT_DATE(), 7, 
      DATE_DIFF(CURRENT_DATE(), DATE_TRUNC(CURRENT_DATE(), WEEK(SUNDAY)), DAY)
    ) DAY)

  END)

) as b

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  post_video_view_time
FROM facebookinsightsownposts
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

  "time" AS "time",

SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size - CHAR_LENGTH(CAST(summe as STRING))), REPLACE(CAST(FORMAT("%'.0f", CAST(ROUND(summe) as NUMERIC)) AS STRING), ",", "."))FROM(
SELECT
  SUM(IFNULL(page_actions_post_reactions_total_like + page_actions_post_reactions_total_love + 
  page_actions_post_reactions_total_wow + page_actions_post_reactions_total_haha + 
  page_actions_post_reactions_total_sorry + page_actions_post_reactions_total_anger +
  page_positive_feedback_by_type_comment + page_positive_feedback_by_type_link
    ,0)) as summe
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebookInsights`
WHERE profileId = $profileID AND $Zeitraum)

SELECT
  SUM(IFNULL(page_actions_post_reactions_total_like + page_actions_post_reactions_total_love +

  page_actions_post_reactions_total_sorry + page_actions_post_reactions_total_anger +
  page_positive_feedback_by_type_comment + page_positive_feedback_by_type_link

targets.rawSql:
WITH past_value as(
SELECT
  SUM(IFNULL(page_actions_post_reactions_total_like + page_actions_post_reactions_total_love + 
  page_actions_post_reactions_total_wow + page_actions_post_reactions_total_haha + 
  page_actions_post_reactions_total_sorry + page_actions_post_reactions_total_anger +
  page_positive_feedback_by_type_comment + page_positive_feedback_by_type_link
    ,0)) as past_sum
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebookInsights`
WHERE profileId = $profileID
  AND $Vergleichszeitraum), current_value AS (
    SELECT
  SUM(IFNULL(page_actions_post_reactions_total_like + page_actions_post_reactions_total_love + 
  page_actions_post_reactions_total_wow + page_actions_post_reactions_total_haha + 
  page_actions_post_reactions_total_sorry + page_actions_post_reactions_total_anger +
  page_positive_feedback_by_type_comment + page_positive_feedback_by_type_link
    ,0)) as current_sum
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebookInsights`
WHERE profileId = $profileID
  AND $Zeitraum
  )
SELECT ((current_sum-past_sum)/past_sum)*100 FROM current_value,past_value as relative_difference

targets.rawSql:
SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size - CHAR_LENGTH(CAST(summe as STRING))), REPLACE(CAST(FORMAT("%'.0f", CAST(ROUND(summe) as NUMERIC)) AS STRING), ",", "."))FROM
(SELECT ROUND((A.InteractionSum / B.Days)) as summe
FROM
-- Get sum of interactions
(SELECT
  SUM(IFNULL(page_actions_post_reactions_total_like + page_actions_post_reactions_total_love + 
  page_actions_post_reactions_total_wow + page_actions_post_reactions_total_haha + 
  page_actions_post_reactions_total_sorry + page_actions_post_reactions_total_anger +
  page_positive_feedback_by_type_comment + page_positive_feedback_by_type_link
    ,0)) as InteractionSum
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebookInsights`
WHERE profileId = $profileID
AND $Zeitraum)
AS A,
-- get days for calculation
  (SELECT
  CASE
    WHEN CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${Zeitraum:text}", "7") THEN 7
    WHEN CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${Zeitraum:text}", "30") THEN 30
    ELSE 1
  END AS Days)
  AS B

)

panels.description: Profilbezogene Daten: Alle Inhalte sind berücksichtigt.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size - CHAR_LENGTH(CAST(summe as STRING))), REPLACE(CAST(FORMAT("%'.0f", CAST(ROUND(summe) as NUMERIC)) AS STRING), ",", "."))FROM
(SELECT ROUND((A.InteractionSum / B.Days)) as summe
FROM
-- Get sum of interactions
(SELECT
  SUM(IFNULL(page_actions_post_reactions_total_like + page_actions_post_reactions_total_love + 
  page_actions_post_reactions_total_wow + page_actions_post_reactions_total_haha + 
  page_actions_post_reactions_total_sorry + page_actions_post_reactions_total_anger +
  page_positive_feedback_by_type_comment + page_positive_feedback_by_type_link
    ,0)) as InteractionSum
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebookInsights`
WHERE profileId = $profileID
  AND $Vergleichszeitraum)
AS A,
-- get days for calculation
  (SELECT
  CASE
    WHEN "$Vergleichszeitraumlabels" = "Letzte 8-14 Tage" THEN 7
    WHEN "$Vergleichszeitraumlabels" = "Letzte 31-60 Tage" THEN 30
    ELSE 1
  END AS Days)
  AS B

)

(
  SELECT ROUND(SUM(A.engaged_users) / MAX(B.days),0) as page_engaged_users
FROM
-- Get engaged users in time range
(SELECT 
page_engaged_users as engaged_users
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebookInsights`
WHERE profileId = $profileID 
AND $Zeitraum) AS A,
  
-- Get days for calculation
  (SELECT
  CASE
    WHEN CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${Zeitraum:text}", "7") THEN 7
    WHEN CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${Zeitraum:text}", "30") THEN 30
    ELSE 1

  AS B
)

    WHEN "$Vergleichszeitraumlabels" = "Letzte 31-60 Tage" THEN 30

panels.description: Inhaltsbezogene Daten: Nur Inhalte, die im ausgewählten Zeitraum veröffentlicht wurden, sind berücksichtigt.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size - CHAR_LENGTH(CAST(ROUND(summe) as STRING))), REPLACE(CAST(FORMAT("%'.0f", CAST(ROUND(summe) as NUMERIC)) AS STRING), ",", "."))FROM
(
SELECT 
  ROUND((sum(a.post_reactions_by_type_total_like	+ a.post_reactions_by_type_total_love	+ 
  a.post_reactions_by_type_total_wow + a.post_reactions_by_type_total_haha + 
  a.post_reactions_by_type_total_sorry	+ a.post_reactions_by_type_total_anger + 
  a.post_activity_by_action_type_share + a.post_activity_by_action_type_comment) / MAX(b.uniquePosts) )) as summe
FROM ( SELECT * FROM
  `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebookInsightsOwnPosts`
WHERE profileId = $profileID
  AND $Zeitraum)
  as a,
  --- collect number of unique posts
  (
    SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT externalId) as uniquePosts
    FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebookInsightsOwnPosts`
    WHERE profileId = $profileID AND $Zeitraum 
  ) as b
  )

panels.description: Inhaltsbezogene Daten: Nur Inhalte, die im ausgewählten Zeitraum veröffentlicht wurden, sind berücksichtigt.

  a.post_reactions_by_type_total_wow + a.post_reactions_by_type_total_haha + 
  a.post_reactions_by_type_total_sorry	+ a.post_reactions_by_type_total_anger + 
  a.post_activity_by_action_type_share + a.post_activity_by_action_type_comment) / MAX(b.uniquePosts) )) as summe
FROM ( SELECT * FROM
  `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebookInsightsOwnPosts`
WHERE profileId = $profileID
  AND $Vergleichszeitraum)
  as a,
  --- collect number of unique posts

    SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT externalId) as uniquePosts

  ) as b
  )

panels.description: Inhaltsbezogene Daten: Nur Inhalte, die im ausgewählten Zeitraum veröffentlicht wurden, sind berücksichtigt.

targets.rawSql:
WITH past_value as(
SELECT 
  ROUND((sum(a.post_reactions_by_type_total_like	+ a.post_reactions_by_type_total_love	+ 
  a.post_reactions_by_type_total_wow + a.post_reactions_by_type_total_haha + 
  a.post_reactions_by_type_total_sorry	+ a.post_reactions_by_type_total_anger + 
  a.post_activity_by_action_type_share + a.post_activity_by_action_type_comment) / MAX(b.uniquePosts) )) as past_sum
FROM ( SELECT * FROM
  `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebookInsightsOwnPosts`
WHERE profileId = $profileID
  AND $Vergleichszeitraum)
  as a,
  --- collect number of unique posts
  (
    SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT externalId) as uniquePosts
    FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebookInsightsOwnPosts`
    WHERE profileId = $profileID AND $Vergleichszeitraum 
  ) as b
)
, current_value AS (
SELECT 
  ROUND((sum(a.post_reactions_by_type_total_like	+ a.post_reactions_by_type_total_love	+ 
  a.post_reactions_by_type_total_wow + a.post_reactions_by_type_total_haha + 
  a.post_reactions_by_type_total_sorry	+ a.post_reactions_by_type_total_anger + 
  a.post_activity_by_action_type_share + a.post_activity_by_action_type_comment) / MAX(b.uniquePosts) )) as current_sum
FROM ( SELECT * FROM
  `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebookInsightsOwnPosts`
WHERE profileId = $profileID
  AND $Zeitraum)
  as a,
  --- collect number of unique posts
  (
    SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT externalId) as uniquePosts
    FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebookInsightsOwnPosts`
    WHERE profileId = $profileID AND $Zeitraum 
  ) as b
)
SELECT ((current_sum-past_sum)/past_sum)*100 FROM current_value,past_value as relative_difference

panels.description: Inhaltsbezogene Daten: Nur Inhalte, die im ausgewählten Zeitraum veröffentlicht wurden, sind berücksichtigt.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size - CHAR_LENGTH(CAST(page_impressions_unique as STRING))), REPLACE(CAST(FORMAT("%'.0f", CAST(ROUND(page_impressions_unique) as NUMERIC)) AS STRING), ",", "."))FROM
(
SELECT
  ROUND(SUM(a.page_impressions_unique) / MAX(b.days), 0) as page_impressions_unique
  FROM
  -- get page impressions
  (SELECT page_impressions_unique
  FROM ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebookInsights
  WHERE profileId = $profileID 
  AND $Zeitraum 
  )
  AS a,
  -- get number of days to divide
    (SELECT
  CASE
    WHEN CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${Zeitraum:text}", "7") THEN 7
    WHEN CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${Zeitraum:text}", "30") THEN 30
    ELSE 1
  END AS days)
  AS b
  )

panels.description: Inhaltsbezogene Daten: Nur Inhalte, die im ausgewählten Zeitraum veröffentlicht wurden, sind berücksichtigt.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size - CHAR_LENGTH(CAST(page_impressions_unique as STRING))), REPLACE(CAST(FORMAT("%'.0f", CAST(ROUND(page_impressions_unique) as NUMERIC)) AS STRING), ",", "."))FROM
(
SELECT
  ROUND(SUM(a.page_impressions_unique) / MAX(b.days), 0) as page_impressions_unique
  FROM
  -- get page impressions
  (SELECT page_impressions_unique
  FROM ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebookInsights
  WHERE profileId = $profileID 
  AND $Vergleichszeitraum 
  )
  AS a,
  -- get number of days to divide
    (SELECT
  CASE
    WHEN "$Vergleichszeitraumlabels" = "Letzte 8-14 Tage" THEN 7
    WHEN "$Vergleichszeitraumlabels" = "Letzte 31-60 Tage" THEN 30
    ELSE 1
  END AS days)
  AS b
  )

    WHEN "$Vergleichszeitraumlabels" = "Letzte 31-60 Tage" THEN 30
    ELSE 1

  AS b
), current_value AS (
SELECT
  ROUND(SUM(a.page_impressions_unique) / MAX(b.days), 0) as current_sum

targets.rawSql:

(
SELECT 
  ROUND(SUM(a.post_impressions_unique) / (MAX(b.uniquePosts) + MAX(c.uniqueVideos)),0) as page_impressions_unique
  FROM 
  -- get engaged users
  (SELECT post_impressions_unique
  FROM ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebookInsightsOwnPosts
  WHERE profileId = $profileID 
  AND $Zeitraum 

) AS A,
-- get number of unique posts
    (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT externalId) as uniquePosts
    FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebookInsightsOwnPosts`
    WHERE profileId = $profileID AND $Zeitraum 
  ) as b,
    --- collect number of unique video posts
  (
    SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT externalId) as uniqueVideos
    FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebookInsightsOwnVideos`
    WHERE profileId = $profileID AND $Zeitraum 
  ) as c
)

panels.description: Inhaltsbezogene Daten: Nur Inhalte, die im ausgewählten Zeitraum veröffentlicht wurden, sind berücksichtigt.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size - CHAR_LENGTH(CAST(Videostarts as STRING))), REPLACE(CAST(FORMAT("%'.0f", CAST(ROUND(Videostarts) as NUMERIC)) AS STRING), ",", "."))FROM
(SELECT ROUND(SUM(ownVideos.total_video_10s_views) / COUNT(ownVideos.externalId)) AS Videostarts FROM
(SELECT 
  *
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebookInsightsOwnPosts`
WHERE profileId = $profileID 
AND $Zeitraum
) as ownPosts, 
(SELECT 
  *
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebookInsightsOwnVideos`
WHERE profileId = $profileID
AND NOT(title ="") 
) as ownVideos 
WHERE ownPosts.objectId = ownVideos.externalId
)

  AND $Zeitraum
  )
SELECT ((current_sum-past_sum)/past_sum)*100 FROM current_value,past_value as relative_difference

panels.description: Inhaltsbezogene Daten: Nur Inhalte, die im ausgewählten Zeitraum veröffentlicht wurden, sind berücksichtigt.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size - CHAR_LENGTH(CAST(ARD_Facebook_Score as STRING))), REPLACE(CAST(FORMAT("%'.0f", CAST(ROUND(ARD_Facebook_Score) as NUMERIC)) AS STRING), ",", "."))FROM
(
SELECT ROUND(a.Follower/1000 + b.interactions/10) as ARD_Facebook_Score
FROM
(SELECT 
followers AS Follower
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebook`
  WHERE profileId = $profileID 
  AND time = (SELECT MAX(time) FROM  `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebook` WHERE profileId = $profileID)) as a,
  (SELECT 
(ROUND (AVG(ownPostsLikes + ownPostsLove + ownPostsWow + ownPostsHaha + ownPostsSad + ownPostsAngry + ownPostsShares + ownPostsComments))) AS interactions
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebook`
  WHERE profileId = $profileID AND $Zeitraum ) as b
)

panels.description: Inhaltsbezogene Daten: Nur Inhalte, die im ausgewählten Zeitraum veröffentlicht wurden, sind berücksichtigt.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size - CHAR_LENGTH(CAST(ARD_Facebook_Score as STRING))), REPLACE(CAST(FORMAT("%'.0f", CAST(ROUND(ARD_Facebook_Score) as NUMERIC)) AS STRING), ",", "."))FROM
(
SELECT ROUND(a.Follower/1000 + b.interactions/10) as ARD_Facebook_Score
FROM
(SELECT 
followers AS Follower
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebook`
  WHERE profileId = $profileID 
  AND time = (SELECT MAX(time) FROM  `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebook` WHERE profileId = $profileID)) as a,
  (SELECT 
(ROUND (AVG(ownPostsLikes + ownPostsLove + ownPostsWow + ownPostsHaha + ownPostsSad + ownPostsAngry + ownPostsShares + ownPostsComments))) AS interactions
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebook`
  WHERE profileId = $profileID AND $Vergleichszeitraum ) as b
)

panels.description: Inhaltsbezogene Daten: Nur Inhalte, die im ausgewählten Zeitraum veröffentlicht wurden, sind berücksichtigt.

targets.rawSql:
WITH past_value as(
  SELECT ROUND(a.Follower/1000 + b.interactions/10) as past_sum
FROM
(SELECT 
followers AS Follower
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebook`
  WHERE profileId = $profileID 
  AND time = (SELECT MAX(time) FROM  `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebook` WHERE profileId = $profileID)) as a,
  (SELECT 
(ROUND (AVG(ownPostsLikes + ownPostsLove + ownPostsWow + ownPostsHaha + ownPostsSad + ownPostsAngry + ownPostsShares + ownPostsComments))) AS interactions
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebook`
  WHERE profileId = $profileID AND $Vergleichszeitraum ) as b
), current_value AS (
  SELECT ROUND(a.Follower/1000 + b.interactions/10) as current_sum
FROM
(SELECT 
followers AS Follower
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebook`
  WHERE profileId = $profileID 
  AND time = (SELECT MAX(time) FROM  `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebook` WHERE profileId = $profileID)) as a,
  (SELECT 
(ROUND (AVG(ownPostsLikes + ownPostsLove + ownPostsWow + ownPostsHaha + ownPostsSad + ownPostsAngry + ownPostsShares + ownPostsComments))) AS interactions
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebook`
  WHERE profileId = $profileID AND $Zeitraum ) as b
  )
SELECT ((current_sum-past_sum)/past_sum)*100 FROM current_value,past_value as relative_difference

options.content: Legende:  🖼️ = Bild    🎥 = Video    🔗 = Link    📕 = Album    📄 = Status

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  post_video_view_time
FROM facebookinsightsownposts
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT 
  post_reactions_by_type_total_anger,
post_reactions_by_type_total_sorry,
post_reactions_by_type_total_haha,
post_reactions_by_type_total_like,
post_reactions_by_type_total_wow,
post_reactions_by_type_total_love,
post_activity_by_action_type_share,
post_activity_by_action_type_comment,
post_impressions_unique,
post_impressions_fan_unique,
post_engaged_users,
link, 
message,
time,
type, 
time,
  CASE 
    WHEN type = 'Video' AND post_video_length = 0
    THEN 'Link' 
    ELSE type
  END AS Typ
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebookInsightsOwnPosts`
WHERE profileId = $profileID 
AND $Zeitraum 
--AND NOT(message = "")
ORDER BY post_engaged_users DESC

SELECT ownPosts.time as Datum, ownVideos.* FROM
(SELECT 
  time,
  objectId,
  CASE 
    WHEN type = 'Video' AND post_video_length = 0
    THEN 'Link' 
    ELSE type
  END AS Typ
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebookInsightsOwnPosts`
WHERE profileId = $profileID 
AND $Zeitraum 
--AND NOT(message = "")
) as ownPosts, 
(SELECT 
  total_video_10s_views,
total_video_views,
total_video_views_by_distribution_type_page_owned,
total_video_views_by_distribution_type_shared,
total_video_avg_time_watched,
total_video_view_total_time,
total_video_views_by_distribution_type_page_owned,
description, 
link,
live_status,
externalId,
FORMAT("%02d:%02d", CAST(FLOOR(length/60) as INT), mod(CAST(length as INT),60)) as length_formatted
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebookInsightsOwnVideos`
WHERE profileId = $profileID
AND NOT(title ="") 
) as ownVideos 

WHERE ownPosts.objectId = ownVideos.externalId
ORDER BY ownVideos.total_video_10s_views DESC

options.content:
# 📊 Hinweise

- Anteil Videostarts im eigenen Feed: Auf Basis Videostarts ab 3 Sek. 
- Die Interaktionen enthalten auch die Interaktionen in Shared Posts.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  post_video_view_time
FROM facebookinsightsownposts
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  post_video_view_time
FROM facebookinsightsownposts
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

query.rawSql:
Select a.LRA  FROM
(
SELECT DISTINCT LRA FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` 
) as a 
ORDER BY(
CASE WHEN a.LRA like  LEFT("${__user.login}",3)
THEN 1
ELSE 0
END
) DESC

SELECT a.profile 
FROM 
(SELECT profile FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` WHERE LRA = '$LRA' AND facebookId != 0) as a,
(SELECT  Profil_FB FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.default-settings` WHERE LRA = '$LRA') as b
ORDER BY( 
CASE WHEN a.profile = b.Profil_FB THEN 1
ELSE 2
END
), a.profile ASC

current.value: EXTRACT(DATE from time) >=  DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL  7 DAY) AND EXTRACT(DATE from time) < CURRENT_DATE()

list.name: Zeitraum_Backup

options.value: EXTRACT(DATE from time) = DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL  1 DAY)

DATE(time) >= (  SELECT    saturday  FROM (    SELECT      DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 1 DAY) AS sunday,      DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 2 DAY) AS saturday ) )  AND DATE(time) <= (  SELECT    sunday  FROM (    SELECT      DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 1 DAY) AS sunday,      DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 2 DAY) AS saturday ) )
EXTRACT(DATE from time) >=  DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL  7 DAY) AND EXTRACT(DATE from time) < CURRENT_DATE()
EXTRACT(DATE from time) >=  DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL  30 DAY) AND EXTRACT(DATE from time) < CURRENT_DATE()

list.query: Gestern : EXTRACT(DATE from time) = DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE()\, INTERVAL  1 DAY), Letztes Wochenende :  DATE(time) >= (  SELECT    saturday  FROM (    SELECT      DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()\, WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 1 DAY) AS sunday\,      DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()\, WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 2 DAY) AS saturday ) )  AND DATE(time) <= (  SELECT    sunday  FROM (    SELECT      DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()\, WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 1 DAY) AS sunday\,      DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()\, WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 2 DAY) AS saturday ) ), Letzte 7 Tage : EXTRACT(DATE from time) >=  DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE()\, INTERVAL  7 DAY) AND EXTRACT(DATE from time) < CURRENT_DATE(), Letzte 30 Tage : EXTRACT(DATE from time) >=  DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE()\, INTERVAL  30 DAY) AND EXTRACT(DATE from time) < CURRENT_DATE()

query.rawSql:
SELECT 
CASE MAX(last_update)
  WHEN NULL THEN "N/A"
  ELSE FORMAT_DATETIME("%d.%m.%Y | %H:%M Uhr", DATETIME(MAX(last_update),"Europe/Berlin"))
  END
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebook`
WHERE profileId = $profileID

SELECT
CASE
WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Gestern" THEN "Vorgestern"
WHEN CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${Zeitraum:text}", "7") THEN "Letzte 8-14 Tage"
WHEN CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${Zeitraum:text}", "30") THEN "Letzte 31-60 Tage" END

current.value: EXTRACT(DATE from time) >=  DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL  7 DAY) AND EXTRACT(DATE from time) < CURRENT_DATE()

list.name: Zeitraum

options.value: EXTRACT(DATE from time) = DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL  1 DAY)
EXTRACT(DATE from time) >=  DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL  7 DAY) AND EXTRACT(DATE from time) < CURRENT_DATE()
EXTRACT(DATE from time) >=  DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL  30 DAY) AND EXTRACT(DATE from time) < CURRENT_DATE()

list.query: Gestern : EXTRACT(DATE from time) = DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE()\, INTERVAL  1 DAY), Letzte 7 Tage : EXTRACT(DATE from time) >=  DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE()\, INTERVAL  7 DAY) AND EXTRACT(DATE from time) < CURRENT_DATE(), Letzte 30 Tage : EXTRACT(DATE from time) >=  DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE()\, INTERVAL  30 DAY) AND EXTRACT(DATE from time) < CURRENT_DATE()

current.text: EXTRACT(DATE from time) >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 14 DAY) AND EXTRACT(DATE from time) < DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)
current.value: EXTRACT(DATE from time) >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 14 DAY) AND EXTRACT(DATE from time) < DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)

query.rawSql:
SELECT
CASE
WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Gestern" THEN "EXTRACT(DATE from time) = DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL  2 DAY)"
WHEN CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${Zeitraum:text}", "7") THEN "EXTRACT(DATE from time) >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 14 DAY) AND EXTRACT(DATE from time) < DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)"
WHEN CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${Zeitraum:text}", "30") THEN "EXTRACT(DATE from time) >=  DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL  60 DAY) AND EXTRACT(DATE from time) < DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL  30 DAY)" END

list.name: Aktion
list.query: Interaktionen : "Interaktionen", Aktive Nutzer : "Aktive Nutzer", Pot. Reichweite : "Pot. Reichweite", Videostarts ab 10 Sek. : "Videostarts ab 10 Sek."

query.rawSql:
SELECT
CASE
WHEN $Aktion = "Interaktion" THEN "SUM(IFNULL(page_actions_post_reactions_total_like + page_actions_post_reactions_total_love + page_actions_post_reactions_total_wow + page_actions_post_reactions_total_haha + page_actions_post_reactions_total_sorry + page_actions_post_reactions_total_anger + page_positive_feedback_by_type_comment + page_positive_feedback_by_type_link,0))"
WHEN $Aktion = "Aktive Nutzer" THEN "SUM(IFNULL(page_engaged_users,0))"
WHEN $Aktion = "Pot. Reichweite" THEN "SUM(IFNULL(page_impressions_unique,0))"
ELSE "SUM(page_video_views_10s)" END

SELECT
CASE
WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Gestern" THEN "now-2d"
WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Letzte 7 Tage" THEN "now-8d"
WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Letzte 30 Tage" THEN "now-31d" END

SELECT
CASE
WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Gestern" THEN 1
WHEN CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${Zeitraum:text}", "7") THEN 7
WHEN CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${Zeitraum:text}", "30") THEN 30 END
